ground_truth.thought: 获取传统支付方式终端的安全性评估数据
ground_truth.name: PaymentSecurity.get_traditional_payment_security_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'PaymentSecurity.get_mobile_payment_security_data', 'description': 'Get the security assessment data for mobile payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'query', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the content of search query'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'content', 'description': 'a list of security assessment data for mobile payment terminals'}]}, {'name': 'PaymentSecurity.get_traditional_payment_security_data', 'description': 'Get the security assessment data for traditional payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'query', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the content of search query'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'content', 'description': 'a list of security assessment data for traditional payment terminals'}]}, {'name': 'PaymentSecurity.compare_security_data', 'description': 'Compare the security assessment data between mobile and traditional payment terminals.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'mobile_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the security assessment data for mobile payment terminals'}, {'name': 'traditional_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the security assessment data for traditional payment terminals'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'content', 'description': 'the comparison result of security assessment data between mobile and traditional payment terminals'}]}]
我想了解移动支付与传统支付在支付终端安全性上的区别。首先，获取移动支付终端的安全性评估数据。然后，获取传统支付方式终端的安全性评估数据。接着，比较两者的差异，并分析这种差异对用户信任度的影响。最后，提供基于支付终端安全性的支付方式选择建议。
获取移动支付终端的安全性评估数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'query'的值是什么?

{'content': 'Mobile payment terminals are equipped with advanced encryption technologies such as AES-256 and TLS 1.3, ensuring secure transactions. They also feature biometric authentication and real-time fraud detection systems to enhance security.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'content': 'Mobile payment terminals are equipped with advanced encryption technologies such as AES-256 and TLS 1.3, ensuring secure transactions. They also feature biometric authentication and real-time fraud detection systems to enhance security.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取传统支付方式终端的安全性评估数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
